component.name: Amphi Music
component.summary: Cross-platform music player with support for syncing libraries via a self-hosted server
component.description:
Amphi Music is a free and open-source, cross-platform music player.
It plays all your music in most popular formats â€” no conversion required. You can easily edit song, album, and artist information.
Once your music library is set up, you can sync your data across devices via a self-hosted server, letting you access and play your library on any platform.
To set up your own server, visit: https://amphi.site
